title: Nate Lind chats with Darryl Hicks about decline salvage
summary: This article features a conversation between serial entrepreneur Nate Lind and FlexPay CEO Darryl Hicks about decline salvage. They discuss how FlexPay's AI Machine Learning Decline Salvage can significantly increase recovery revenue by addressing various aspects of payment recovery and customer retention.
key_points: FlexPay's AI Machine Learning Decline Salvage can double recovery revenue.
Discussion covers industry average decline rates, rules-based vs. AI reprocessing, and Visa's recommendations.
Key topics include the difference between decline salvage and dunning, and FlexPay's recommended retry attempts.
The article touches on the future of decline salvage across various e-commerce verticals and includes a case study on ROI.
